description: Lists all repositories associated with the specified approval rule template.

parameters.name: approvalRuleTemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the approval rule template for which you want to list repositories that are associated with that template.

nested_items.name: repositoryNames
nested_items.description: A list of repository names that are associated with the specified approval rule template.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An enumeration token that allows the operation to batch the next results of the operation.
